# PonyDriland website map for LLMs

> Pony Driland is a fic project involving science fiction, mystery, and drama, and some other topics that you can find out about through the website. This repository stores all files related to the canonical story of Pony Driland. The project development is being worked on in a private repository. This repository is used to share the final version of parts of the project and website.

Inside these files you will find node names called \<ai>\</ai> where it contains text that was generated by AI to help develop content within the file.</ai>

This file contains links to documentation sections following the llmstxt.org standard.

## Table of Contents

### Characters

- [Aniya](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/aniya/README.md): Official Aniya Wiki Page. Aniya is a fortune teller operating out of a hut in Blackburn Village. She uses a crystal ball and "temporal energy" to...
- [Ivy](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/ivy/README.md): Official Ivy Wiki Page. A gentle and somewhat timid pony, Ivy finds herself lost in Pony Driland and entangled in its conflicts. She is characterized by her kindness, shyness, and...
- [James](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/james/README.md): Official James Wiki Page. James is one of the scientists responsible for developing the source code that helped create the Pony Driland dimension.
- [Amy](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/amy/README.md): Official Amy Wiki Page. Amy is one of Rainbow Queen's pets. Her sweet personality was a result of past events of her accidentally going to Pony Driland.
- [Layla](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/layla/README.md): Official Layla Wiki Page. Layla is one of Rainbow Queen's pets, her gentle nature shaped by a past event that led her to Pony Driland by accident.
- [Princess Ariella](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/princess-ariella/README.md): Official Princess Ariella Wiki Page. Ariella is the founder of Pony Driland, and of her mysterious kingdom she ruled on her home planet before this planet has...
- [Prisma](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/prisma/README.md): Prisma is a commander within the Elite Color organization, one of the oldest unicorns in all Pony Driland. She's story has a direct involvement with the Royal Color and she is one...
- [Rainbow Queen](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/rainbow-queen/README.md): Rainbow Queen is a majestic and enigmatic figure in the world of Pony Driland, a powerful being with a complex personality, she is known for both her benevolence and...
- [Rayane](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/rayane/README.md): Rayane is one of Pony Driland's most mysterious ponies. There are many legends about her role and why she is always spying on other ponies.
- [Yasmin](https://ponydriland.com/data/characters/yasmin/README.md): The story of this Yasmin (Yasmin Seidel) separates from my original timeline on the date 24 jul, 2021.  That means everything that happened to me after this date no longer belongs...

### Places

- [Pony Driland Dimension](https://ponydriland.com/data/places/dimension/README.md): Pony Driland is an artificial dimension created by James and his brother. The original purpose of this dimension was to serve as an interdimensional bunker...
